mani.name: Basic Spa Manicure
mani.desc: Treatment consists of a hand soak, nail clipping and shaping, cuticle work, moisturizer, hand and forearm massage, a warm towel wrap, and polish.

mani.name: Deluxe Spa Manicure
mani.desc: A Basic Spa Manicure treatment which also includes a sugar scrub and paraffin wax treatment.
